meanings.sent1: She enjoys aerobicizing at the gym every morning.
meanings.sent2: People benefit from aerobicizing regularly to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: After aerobicizing, she felt energized and ready for the day.
meanings.sent4: Aerobicizing is like giving your heart a little dance party.
meanings.sent5: The group of friends aerobicizing together looked like a synchronized team.

meanings.definition: The act of performing aerobic exercises.
meanings.sent1: Aerobicizing can improve your overall fitness level.
meanings.sent2: The instructor led a fun aerobicizing class at the community center.
meanings.sent3: During the aerobicizing session, everyone was smiling and sweating.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic movements in aerobicizing are like a graceful dance.
meanings.sent5: The park was filled with people of all ages enjoying aerobicizing outdoors.

meanings.definition: To participate in activities that increase cardiovascular fitness.
meanings.sent1: He committed to aerobicizing regularly to strengthen his heart.
meanings.sent2: Aerobicizing is a great way to boost your endurance.
meanings.sent3: The dog joined in the aerobicizing routine, wagging its tail.
meanings.sent4: Aerobicizing is like a love letter to your heart, showing you care.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky as they were aerobicizing by the beach.
